<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/17143/news.17143-120x120.jpg" alt="Cherry Oud, Oud Nude and Oud Khl: Three Lovely Novelties From Guerlain" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Cherry-Oud-Oud-Nude-and-Oud-Khol-three-lovely-novelties-from-Guerlain-17143.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Cherry Oud, Oud Nude and Oud Khl: Three Lovely Novelties From Guerlain</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Prokofeva</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            10/09/22 13:02
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">17</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="76304"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.39</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="76304"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.21</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

Kurkdjian</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Baccarat Rouge 540 Extrait de Parfum</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes><span title="/perfume-finder/?p=76304" padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/777408">Phantosmia Bella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 23:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For some reason, the opening gives me the vibes of Aroma Allegoria Exalting Aromaparfum https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Guerlain/Aroma-Allegoria-Exalting-Aromaparfum-5844.html<br />
The don't really share any common notes... Some classic woody and spicy Gerlain DNA, maybe?<br />
Anyway, this is lovely, but has a bit of a "sweaty skin after eating a seasoned meal" sensation.<br />
The dry down is much more toned down, and reminds me of La Petite Robe Noire's older, maybe slightly oriental, sister. <br />
Very nice!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2327914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2327914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299015" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stephenmpx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298005.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stephenmpx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Jasmin-Grandiflorum-Extrait-30-87540.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87540.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasmin Grandiflorum Extrait 30"title="Jasmin Grandiflorum Extrait 30"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); I know it isn't listed in the notes, but it's there. I have a visceral reaction to it every time it's in a composition. It comes and goes here. Sometimes I am loving it, but alas, there it is again. Just can't get past it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2299015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2299015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251513" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="azdasih"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223776"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="azdasih" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2223776">azdasih</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 13:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initially, I was enamoured by this - the butteriness of the fragrance (almond to smooth the oud creases out) back in 2022. I was going to buy a full bottle until I was convinced by friends to go for Tobacco Honey (launched a week prior) instead. I thought for a while that perhaps I'd regret being swayed but they were right.<br />
<br />
Sure there's Oud, sandalwood, almond but that's all there is to it almost - dries down to become the most boring combination of the ingredients. Smells like the inside of an expensive shoe box a little, very safe, understated vanilla moment. Not wow-ed by this whatsoever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2251513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2251513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JRLT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JRLT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76304.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Nude"title="Oud Nude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927133">JRLT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know this is more feminine but the note breakdown is my exact match for favourite notes. Tried instore and loved it, waited for a bargain to pop up and managed to get approx 88ml for 140. Is it worth retail? Certainly not but then again is any fragrance?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2248019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2248019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2237532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237532" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hussrahal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hussrahal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515487">hussrahal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, incredible fragrance.<br />
Like a sweeter Versace Santal Boisee.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2237532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2237532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237379" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Distantspring"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201969"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1201969.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Distantspring" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201969">Distantspring</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I'm being totally honest, I'm not a fan of Guerlain's current direction, in which they dump all their efforts into this L'Art et la Matieres collection, as very few of these are true keepers and rarely if ever worth their now astronomical price (in my opinon).<br />
That said, here we see Delphine, who is the mind behind La Petite Robe Noire, let fully loose on her number 1 style of fragrance, the amygdaloid, cerise gourmandesque. Almonds, berries and vanilla are her weapons of choice, and it's therefore no surprise that Oud Nude smells wonderful.<br />
To me, Oud Nude belongs in the same Category as Lutens' Rahat Loukoum - high-almond. I don't get much oud here, but there is a smooth, subtly woody depth to the scent which grounds and rounds out the bakewell tart-like aspects. A very pretty and quite feminine scent, with good longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2237379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2237379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Creamy_ambrette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Creamy_ambrette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Tonka-76063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"title="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057">Creamy_ambrette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 14:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunning!! It smells like Babylon or SDV with added almond and a waxy/buttery lipstick nuance. I swear theres Iris Iris orris root in the composition. My favorite is the Guerlain Ouds. FB worthy for me once my 10ml dabber runs out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2227331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2227331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scensitive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scensitive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Royal-Vanilla-55845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Vanilla"title="Royal Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445">scensitive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 08:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Without being obviously gourmand, Oud Nude has a few delicate sweet notes.<br />
<br />
Cherry almond cookies with halved candied cherries or a more rustic amaretti unfurl as delightful eyesores somehow.    While both of these warmed might play scent double with Guerlain's creamy oud skin scent, alas the Pennsylvania Dutch cherry almond frosted shortbread takes the ribbon par excellence.  <br />
<br />
Early weekend mornings toiling over pink donuts, boiled bagels, or a giant pink almond shortbread before brunch with Lancaster lass' laughing behind their farmer's market crates at lay people in shorts ogling their fare.  <br />
<br />
Something old and sweet, though fresh and innocent.  Almondy cherry with a little oud for longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2225963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2225963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214602" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manda88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manda88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); I first tried it on skin several months ago and I kept smelling my wrist and the tester strip over and over. I finally but the bullet and purchased a bottle and I have no regrets. Even if you are not a fan of our, try this. This is a soft, clean, cozy oud. This will forever be in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2214602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2214602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prideau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prideau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); Soft, feminine and cozy yet mysterious and sexy. For me, the fruity almond its sweet and playful in the beginning then it warms up with the vanilla and a dash of oud. Love at first sniff!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2213912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2213912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159810" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Has_x8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1682735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1682735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Has_x8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Cologne-House/Pastel-92655.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92655.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt=" Pastel"title=" Pastel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1682735">Has_x8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fabulous blend .. cold oud thats what is all about, <br />
<br />
Really liked it calm and elegant, unique of course .. really recommend it. <br />
<br />
Note that it performs good but its not a bomb I have it cause I like the identity of Guerlain.<br />
<br />
Performance 7/10<br />
Sillage 7/10<br />
Smell 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2159810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2159810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2154011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2154011" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sandy991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014580"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sandy991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Musc-Ravageur-Limited-Edition-2018-52128.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52128.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Ravageur Limited Edition 2018"title="Musc Ravageur Limited Edition 2018"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2154011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2154011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014580">Sandy991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scroll all the way down to the very first review. @joov84 nails it: Oud Nude is Raghba, with better ingredients. I am sampling Oud Nude right now. When I first sprayed it, it seemed familiar. It was only when I looked at the "This Reminds Me Of" section that I realized why. That being said, it is stunning. I get a lot of cherry. The oud is there, but it is not barnyard oud. This is completely unsex. I can't speak definitively about how it wears because I am sampling form a 3ml sprayer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2154011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2154011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Itcannotalwaysbenight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Itcannotalwaysbenight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Zouzou-92290.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92290.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zouzou"title="Zouzou"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320">Itcannotalwaysbenight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Minimalist and sexy are two things that come to mind when describing Oud Nude. Oud Nude is the perfect namesake for this "barely-there-oud" masterpiece.  The oud in this one is sheer and soft... it is not dark, heavy, nor too earthy as with many mainstream ouds. I would further describe the oud as an abstract tickle of leather. You pick up on the slightest leathery oud note, but it is not heavy nor in your face. Many (even with a refined nose) would not be able to place this as an "oud" fragrance. It is a barely-there oud, so devout oud lovers may be left disappointed. <br />
<br />
The raspberry is my favorite note of all in Oud Nude. Delphine Jelk's play on raspberry is what makes this fragrance a masterpiece in my eyes. Imagine biting into the ripest, plump raspberry on a cool summer evening. The raspberry note is the perfect balance of tart and sweet. I find that most fragrances do not capture the tartness elements in berry fruits accurately, many berry accords come off as either synthetic or overly sweet. Oud Nude is a true photorealistic play on raspberry. The vanilla and almond are also present, but they do not present as gourmand. The almond is more woody than nutty, and the vanilla more so creamy than sweet. The cedar and sandalwood are where I would draw comparisons to Xerjoff Bouquet Ideale, but other than that they are two different legends on their own. <br />
<br />
I am smitten and could go on for days about Oud Nude (feel free to PM me to discuss more). I am so proud to call this my signature year round fragrance. Others will want to inhale your scent cloud whenever you have on Oud Nude. I hate the idea of buying "back-up" bottles, but for fear of Guerlain's history and pattern of discontinuations, a second 200ml bottle is on my wish list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2151936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2151936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147441" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angelus Libri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1906364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angelus Libri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906364">Angelus Libri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a bright splash of syrupy red berries. Somewhere between a Shirley Temple and children's cough syrup. It then eases into a very mild oud. The oud in this is a light rubbery oud. A backbone of creamy sandalwood and vanilla holds it all together. The dry down conjures up an imagine of rubber pour spout from some type of cherry syrup bottle grinded into a fine rubber powder. I don't hate it but I don't love it. Decent longevity and projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2147441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2147441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141656" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leatherorrisviolet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1048023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leatherorrisviolet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paris-Hilton/Gold-Rush-Man-41567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Rush Man"title="Gold Rush Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1048023">leatherorrisviolet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 19:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As usual, Guerlain knocks the ball out of the park again. This is like an oud version of Tom Ford Lost Cherry. Take the same oud that is in Atkinsons Oud Save the King, blend it with Lost Cherry, and that is what this fragrance is. Its so expertly blended it is unreal</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2141656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2141656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108631" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A_Ferrera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1287424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="A_Ferrera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1287424">A_Ferrera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 05:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really cannot see this as a Guerlain. It smells like those cherry scented coconut husk car fresheners that you come in a tin can!<br />
<br />
I can't detect any Guerlain traits aside from the quality. Doesn't really last on my skin and in all honesty Oud Nude smells quite juvenile.<br />
<br />
This was inspired by "California Scents Car Scents Air Freshener Can Coronado Cherry"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2108631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2108631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105100" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShowMustGoOn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShowMustGoOn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Suede"title="White Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775">ShowMustGoOn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delphine Jelk did it again! Absolutely gorgeous, sweet oud scent. Its fruity yet complex with a big dose of that guerlanaide vanilla and a dash of oud. The oud is subtle yet noticeable. Full bottle worthy!<br />
Testing in the summer - more almond and more oud. In colder months more raspberry and sweeter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2105100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2105100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098457" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dunnie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457480.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dunnie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457480">Dunnie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Completely unisex. This reminds me a lot of Tom Ford Lost Cherry. I havent compared them side by side, but Im immediately reminded of it. In the opening I get a fruitiness like cherry or raspberry with light oud that comes across ever so slightly smoky. Absolutely nothing dirty or dark and you may not even pick up the smokiness. As it dries you get some woods and vanilla. Not super complex, but not boring. Guerlain quality. I love this. Jelk is creating some youthful fragrances and I can appreciate that. I know shes catching some flack, but I wonder if Wasser was welcomed with open arms when he took over? Those seeking out a dirty, deep oud should look past this. Go check out Oud Khol or Cherry Oud. This is the most wearable fragrance on the market with oud in the title.<br />
<br />
EDIT: I compared LC to ON and if you simply replace the booze in LC with oud they are very similar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2098457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2098457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091415" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DiscoPolga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DiscoPolga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Baciami-71541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baciami"title="Baciami"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230682">DiscoPolga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The notes listed above represent this fragrance very well. Its oud-forward with a fruity kick, cherry rather than raspberry. Slight powderiness from the almond. Its not my cup of tea as you need to love oud to really enjoy it, but I think it might be a nice choice for the oud lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2091415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2091415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CarolLovesPerfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490779.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CarolLovesPerfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Cruz-del-Sur-II-46098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cruz del Sur II"title="Cruz del Sur II"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490779">CarolLovesPerfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 12:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First Impression on skin.  To me smelling from the sprayer and at first spray this fragrance does remind me of Xerjoff - Bouquet Ideal, which I love. After this has dried down it is not as sweet as Xerjoff, the woods are more prominent in Oud Nude.  I do like it but I think I still prefer the Xerjoff - Bouquet Ideal where it as more sweetness to my nose. I do not really pick up the Rose or the Raspberry here.  I hope this helps if on the fence about this fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2081995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2081995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2069542" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2bClare"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="2bClare" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Comme-des-Garcons-Series-3-Incense-Kyoto-1232.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1232.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comme des Garcons Series 3 Incense: Kyoto"title="Comme des Garcons Series 3 Incense: Kyoto"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2069542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2069542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281">2bClare</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think they should have called this Sparkling Oud Nude. It is truly crystalline and so smooth yet spicy. I get cherries and a little almond instead of what I think of as the sweeter jammier raspberry. To me cherry has just a small taste of liquor in it and thats what I get from this. That might be the vanilla. In any case, this may be the brightest, lightest Oud type fragrance around. Very uplifting and energizing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2069542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2069542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067697" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karinavi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karinavi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071">karinavi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 20:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>veeeery strong. children's cold medicine? becomes warm and more subdued, the vanilla and almond shine more, but that prominent synthetic-smelling oud (infinitely better than the barnyard type) hardly changes. <br />
gotta be an oud fan for this one, wearable and smooth as it is, and unfortunately i just can't be one. would probably adore this without it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2067697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2067697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060237" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glassbloc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947853.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glassbloc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); I feel like I've stepped into a forest. Lovely but I prefer wood as a base note, not the top note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2060237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2060237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
@ScentualP on TikTok/instagram</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2057910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2057910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manda88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manda88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301563">Manda88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 11:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Please dont look at the reminds me of section. Its nothing like Xerjoff Bouquet Ideale or any of those that I have tried. Yes, this is a safe and clean Oud. I would even go as far as to call it a beginners Oud, as the sandalwood and vanilla temper it. The only negative is the price tag! Yikes. But to me, this one is worth the splurge and one day it will be in my collection GDI!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2044889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2044889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2042446" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2042446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2042446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-26">01/26/24 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud Nude<br />
<br />
I think oud interpretation for Oud Nude is a bit boring for me, might be too safe.<br />
<br />
It was vanilla conconation with oud that bark like.<br />
When it reach final dry down.. it is remains bark like and turn sour..<br />
<br />
I will pass this.. this is not for me.<br />
=====<br />
Reassert note... May 20, 2024<br />
<br />
I think I need to revisit Oud Nude. I haven't quite mature will Guerlain offering back then in January 2024. Structure wise... This might be tribute of Delphine Jelk to Thierry Wasser.<br />
It is One of Guerlain's Vanilla dominant  offering (Another 2 is Tonka Imperiale, SDV)<br />
<br />
And don't forget that Almond + Raspberry = Cherry, the ghost note from L'homme Ideal and early Tonka Imperiale, Iconic work from Thierry Passer and Vanilla was embody of Guerlain as a whole anyway... <br />
<br />
To add note after 2nd Reassert..<br />
<br />
(5.20.2024, 21.00 hrs)<br />
I drove to Siam Paragon, in the same evening when I actualize the above statement. <br />
The very same day and yeah.. it is. It is Cherry, Vanilla and Woody Oud concoction.<br />
<br />
The sour touch that I perceive in the first assessment, 1.26.2024 actually part of Raspberry note. I truly perceive as Cherry now. Wonderful.., I wear my 75ml. bottle of Tonka Imperiale yesterday (5.19.204) and very much joy the ghost cherry note which present strongly, I don't find this aspect in 200ml. bottle, the tobacco is stronger in that.<br />
<br />
The Vanilla in this is very clean, even it is carry the strong characteristic of Guerlain's vanilla but it smooth more than other offering. Cuir Beluga, SDV still have certain Guerlain powdery vanilla profile to it. But OudNude, is truly Guerlain Vanilla done in new way.<br />
It feels smooth and clean. I feel that this is even more clean than most Guerlain is offering which is already clean already. OudNude surely wear like smooth undergarment make from silk.<br />
<br />
This fragrance has soft projection but it strong, it last more than a day with 2 sprays.<br />
On certain area, I can smell it on the next day, days can really change the way you see the fragrance... Yeah, you may just need time. <br />
<br />
9/10 (Being smooth Guerlain Vanilla, Cherry undertone, Mild Woody Oud - soft &amp; linger perfectly perfect modern Guerlain profile)..<br />
<br />
Mon Guerlain...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2042446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2042446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2007847" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeybunny1977"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeybunny1977" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2007847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2007847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659277">honeybunny1977</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-22">12/22/23 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dupe is sublime.  It opens with smooth delicious woody almond, then develops into a beautiful raspberry with some oud in the background.  I'd say if you dont like oud this wouldnt be appealing however its done well, not harsh at all.  The rose hits me in the dry down and its elegant &amp; soft.  (*I let it maserate for a good 6 wks and I grab this one so much more than I expected.  its called:  oud of purity by dua)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2007847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2007847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170559">Starlight_moon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-16">12/16/23 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is truly beautiful fragrance! The scent,  the longevity and projection - just perfect! However,  I'm not sure if it's just me, but as soon as I sprayed and during the whole day while wearing it, I kept thinking that this fragrance reminded me of something I wore before. At last it dawned on me- Guerlain Black Perfecto LPRN!! It's crazy but I also do smell cherry in Oud Nude, not raspberry as a listed note. There are definitely similarities in notes in both of these fragrances,  plus both are released by the same house,  so to me these two scents are definitely "sisters".</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
