padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665029">CPS719</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ignored this at first bc of the amount of votes being compared to BI from Xerjoff which I own already.  However, I obtained a sample recently &amp; at first sniff I thought yes then... no.  BI is more cinna-raspberry + spices. In oud nude I smell the same almondy rose note I find in Rose Cherie + raspberry.. on my skin it smells moreso like dark cherry almond rose. The oud in this is clean &amp; adds an edge to the composition. I get Guerlains vanilla dna in this as well. FBW for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1996013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1996013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sdevyatova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.424281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sdevyatova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Lyra-Peach-91089.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91089.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lyra Peach "title="Lyra Peach "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/424281">sdevyatova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 14:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is sooooo similar to bouquet ideale (I have both and a nose that works loll)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1985159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1985159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mith/Ambery-Musk-88281.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88281.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambery Musk"title="Ambery Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-24">11/24/23 06:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this because I wanted to try out more ouds. However, this wasn't what I was expecting at all -- in a good way. At first, the oud and rose part reminded me of Rien Intense Incense without the incense, which is one of my all-time favorites. However, that part of it moves into the background as it becomes more like a raspberry and strawberry mix with the oud and rose very far removed. I can smell it wafting up from my wrist every now and then, and it reminds me of the natural scent of a couple of girls I knew, which may be where the "nude" part comes into play in the name. It's really gorgeous. My jaw kind of dropped at the cost of the full bottle since it's nearly $400, so it will be expensive even as a decant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1984022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1984022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlexaO22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1620024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlexaO22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-Brandt/Bois-de-Santal-89216.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89216.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois de Santal"title="Bois de Santal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620024">AlexaO22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>She is stunning, she is sexy, she is mysterious ! <br />
Or him -I find it unisex but leaning fem. <br />
And it's perfect for cooler months. <br />
<br />
   I'm not the biggest fan of oud, but here it's done beautifully. It's prominent but very, very smooth. And that raspberry !  Nothing cheap, synthetic or too juvenile here. It's perfectly blended with the almond, wood, vanilla, and just a tinge of rose. Performance is stellar to say the least, and it leaves an intoxicating trail that will undoubtedly bring compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1971153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1971153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1955346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cdcs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cdcs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Narcotic-Delight-89368.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89368.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narcotic Delight"title="Narcotic Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1955346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1955346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188872">cdcs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 14:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ABSOLUTELY LOVELY. Beautiful scent, I usually hate raspberries but this is so well blended I simply find it to be a work of art. Because I have a distaste for raspberry, I still dont like it or buy it for myself, but I still keep a decant because its such a lovely scent. The oud? Marvellously blended, chic, not a single speck of dirt in sight. The vanilla? Smooth and binds everything together masterfully, without overpowering the scent. The raspberry is very far from cough syrup, the almonds are simply delectable. Not roasted almonds, btw, its very clearly almonds au naturel, so beware (I personally love almonds either way so) but it goes SO WELL with the oud and the vanilla it's bonkers. The bare, fresh almonds prevent this from becoming too gourmand or dessert-like, giving some freshness and versatility to the scent, somehow. It just works so well, in ways I never expected it to. I expected something completely different from the notes, and this definitely surpassed my expectations. Beautiful, Im considering gifting it to my mom since she loved it so much and that way I can keep experiencing this marvellous concoction regularly without having to wear it necessarily. Stunning fragrance, 10/10 love it I only dont wear it because no matter how well blended I still have a dislike for raspberry haha</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1955346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1955346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Can't detect no raspberry or almond- the oud is pretty strong and takes over</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1946668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1946668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1934761" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1934761" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Viktorija_Stockholm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264749"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264749.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Viktorija_Stockholm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Room-1015/Cherry-Punk-Extrait-de-Parfum-89051.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89051.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cherry Punk Extrait de Parfum"title="Cherry Punk Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1934761ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1934761" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264749">Viktorija_Stockholm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-22">09/22/23 13:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful fragrance. Warm, sweetened, spiced, very well blended. The oud here is subtle and not overwhelming. But You still have to like Oud somewhat otherwise its not going to be your fragrance. It reminds me of one of my fav fragrances BEWITCHING YASMINE by Penhaligons, which is like a cousin to Oud Nude.  I love both, however cant justify the price of 390$ for 100ml. Bewitching Yasmine costs 220 for 75ml which is already a high price. This is a first fragrance from Guerlain L'Art &amp; La Matire line Im trying, and it started very well, 10 out of 10!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1934761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1934761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1904475" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1904475" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kali85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/80169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kali85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-54785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani"title="Ani"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1904475ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1904475" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/80169">Kali85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-17">08/17/23 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud Nude is enveloping, elegant and sweet (as one would expect from a perfume in the L'Art et la Matire collection). The oud is obvious in the beginning, but it's not obnoxious or harsh at all. It's very smooth and it meshes surprisingly well with the other notes. It eventually disappears and you're left with a drydown that is identical to Spiritueuse Double Vanille. So, in a nutshell, if you're a fan of SDV and you want to dip your toes in the world of oud (and you can stomach the price): this is your guy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1904475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1904475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lmnsvgz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259533.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lmnsvgz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1969-Parfum-de-Revolte-4492.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4492.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1969 Parfum de Revolte"title="1969 Parfum de Revolte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259533">lmnsvgz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-24">07/24/23 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly sweet, dry almost powdery oud. One of the most wearable ouds I have smelled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1885933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1885933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Qatar-45749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Qatar"title="Qatar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 22:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud Nude is so sensual and smooth. I agree with what others are saying about it being similar to Cherry Smoke. Oud Nude is a little sweeter, Cherry Smoke is smokier. I love both. I couldn't stop smelling my wrist when I first tried this. Love the raspberry, almond, &amp; oud in this application, it's really so refined. Defeintely a fragrance I'd love to wear in the fall. So cozy &amp; comforting-- which comes from the famous Guerlain DNA. Defeintely FB worthy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1881844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1881844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197444">Gracile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Too sweet for my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1874994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1874994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gatorsrules"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565764.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gatorsrules" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565764">Gatorsrules</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-24">06/24/23 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great intro to Oud IMO. Its quite western style Oud with a touch of fruit and powdery accords. The raspberry behaves more like cherry with a bit of a syrupy/tart vibe. The almond and woods balance the Oud. This isnt an animalic Oud for me. May be FB worthy, and it also behaves with the heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1863885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1863885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1850830" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scruz.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632039"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632039.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scruz.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Pink-Me-Up-76834.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76834.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pink Me Up"title="Pink Me Up"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1850830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1850830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632039">scruz.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-06">06/06/23 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just sampling this and I love it. The raspberry rose and almond make a lovely accord resting gently on top of the soft oud and woody smells. Even though this perfume is fancy, I wore it for a long walk with my dog on a warm spring-summer evening, through lots of wooded areas in my neighbourhood. I couldnt stop smelling this gorgeous fragrance that complements nature so perfectly. Its true that there is almost a Cherry smell, but its really the soft raspberry rose blended with almond. I sprayed the tiniest squirt once on my wrist and was impressed with its longevity and projection. As much as I adore this I will likely not own a full bottle as its about 500$ here in Canada after tax. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1850830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1850830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1843097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1843097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sheherazad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716680"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716680.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sheherazad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rania-J/Ambre-Loup-14926.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14926.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Loup"title="Ambre Loup"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1843097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1843097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716680">Sheherazad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-27">05/27/23 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious, dark, smoldering cherry. Luscious smoke swirls respectfully around the cherry rather than smothering it. Ive never thought of smoke as luscious, but in dry down this cherry embraces the smoke like a long lost lover. They climax as onesoftly, smoothly, morphing into a well-blended entity that magnetizes noses near &amp; far. People approach me each time I wear this to ask What scent? Although its a near dupe for TF Cherry Smoke, CS has a more artificial cherry note than Oud Nude imo. This Oud Nude cherry is more photorealistic. Its the cherry TF would have created were he still at the helm. (Sigh. Were missing your DNA, Tom. ) As for the smoke, while comparing the two scents I noted something interesting. Whereas Oud Nude eventually retires its cherry, leaving only smoke &amp; woods, Cherry Smoke does just the opposite; the cherry in CS finds its voice mid-evolution &amp; continues to sing until the curtain closes, dissipating the smoke to mere wisps. Though I love both of these scents, I find myself reaching for Oud Nude more often for its realistic cherry note &amp; the way it so perfectly melds w/ the smoke.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1843097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1843097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1841282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Honestly I could see myself going for this over CS</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1841282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1841282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1827551" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anncka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1197008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anncka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Spiritueuse-Double-Vanille-3345.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3345.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spiritueuse Double Vanille"title="Spiritueuse Double Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1827551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1827551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197008">anncka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-08">05/08/23 03:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have yet to find an oud fragrance that I like. But being a die hard Guerlain fan and based on the reviews of my dear fellow fragheads below I am very much intrigued by this one! Ill be looking for a sample to say the least.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1827551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1827551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819478" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AquaBaby5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AquaBaby5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Ilio-67808.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67808.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ilio"title="Ilio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224027">AquaBaby5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-27">04/27/23 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has VERY similar DNA to Cherry Smoke IMO. Instead of cherry though it has raspberry and it is less intense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1819478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1819478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1818323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lara_540"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lara_540" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1818323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1818323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731632">Lara_540</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-26">04/26/23 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont post reviews but I must say, this perfume is gorgeous. Once you spray it, it doesnt feel overpowering however a few minutes after it cools down, you feel like it melts into your skin the best way possible. Its not overpowering but you feel that it is there in a subtle way. Ive received many compliments on this perfume, as my fragrance filled the room. Ironically, I dont feel like its that strong. I suggest you to check it out before purchasing, since its a bit expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1818323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1818323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804043" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ni11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ni11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723800">ni11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very beautiful. Well blended, smooth woody scent. Gentle oud, not the polarising kind. Very classy vanilla, there is no synthetic quality about it. Almond note is lovely. Only gripe is that the scent becomes intimate to me after a few hours, but others seem to pick it up from a moderate distance at the end of the day. The woody warmth makes this a perfect scent for colder seasons. This is femininity, softness and grace in a bottle. Definitely an investment at this price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1804043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1804043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you are not fund of pure oud scents, this is a creamy soft take on oud with fruity raspberry I find quite unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1799298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1799298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1798927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1798927" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CeeTee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1420837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CeeTee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Original-Vetiver-468.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.468.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Original Vetiver"title="Original Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1798927ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1798927" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420837">CeeTee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-02">04/02/23 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a true oud. Very pure. I got more cherry from this than Cherry Oud. (Just a hint.) If youre an oud fan, its worth a sniff. Its not synthetic feeling. Really great quality, here. Im oud fatigued, myself, but if you like a classy oud, this is a good one. I dont feel that the other notes detract from the oud at all. Very nice offering from Guerlain. P.S. The oud here reminds me of the Creed Royal Oud style. I find this unisex for a confident guy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1798927"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1798927#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1794367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049">amanda0727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-27">03/27/23 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fecal oud. Immediate no for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1794367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1794367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1791695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumejunkie77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570068"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570068.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumejunkie77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1791695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1791695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570068">perfumejunkie77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-24">03/24/23 13:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is gooda gentle oud scent with a hint of juicy berries (maybe a ghost-like cherry aura). The dusting of almond and vanilla just makes the oud delicious instead of animalic. I find Guerlain's "Cherry Oud" perfume a little sharp with engine-oil agarwood vibes. This, on the other hand, is a cloud of soft oud that lives up to its name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1791695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1791695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1750468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1750468" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elindio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1213067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elindio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/B683-46802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="B683"title="B683"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1750468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1750468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213067">Elindio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-03">02/03/23 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>L'homme idal eau de parfum revisit raffin <br />
Framboise vanille amande et du cuir qui n'est pas rpertori rose bois santal et un peu de oud synthtique parfum agrable penche masculin ,volution en fume oudi sucr sans exagration <br />
trs agrable odeur trs niche ingrdients de haute qualit ,ne vaut pas le prix demand <br />
Une trs bonne longvit sur ma peau trs bonne projection les deux premires heures <br />
J'ai ramass un flacon  un trs bon prix <br />
Note : 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1750468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1750468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thesheppardess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.770623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thesheppardess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623">thesheppardess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I detect is oud. Then there is my other nemesis, sandalwood. Because of the oud, I dont catch the other listed notes. Maybe a slight bit of sour fruit and rose, but I really have to stretch my imagination to detect either note.<br />
Please note that I love many other Guerlain fragrances; it is my favourite house. I was hoping perhaps the had created an oud-based fragrance that I might like, but no.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1738889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1738889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738635" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ceeceelee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272514"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1272514.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ceeceelee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Embruns-d-Ylang-55251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Embruns d'Ylang"title="Embruns d'Ylang"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272514">ceeceelee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 23:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a gorgeous scent. I received several samples from a large order from Place Vendome, so I've been taking my time with it. Guerlain perfumes from the L'Art &amp; la Matiere line have become an investment. Never in my lifetime will I be able to finish a 100 ml bottle much less a 50 ml. So if I'm going to buy, I go into the purchase acknowledging this. It's a Guerlain through and through. Soft, slightly woody, fruity, creamy almond with a faint peppery finish. Based on the way it smells, I'd buy. Snap it up. Unfortunately, my breathing is affected it by it. So that means Iso E Super. You can even smell it in the dry down, a very <i>faint</i> cedarish peppery finish. I don't find the odor objectionable, but the breathing problems it brings makes it non negotiable.  If you have reactions to aroma chemicals, you might want to sample first. I'm heartbroken, the first from this line in a couple of years to really tempt me. If you don't have issues with this, I'd rec giving this one a try.  A big love for the scent from me, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1738635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1738635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738617" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cocobello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392276"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cocobello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392276">Cocobello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 22:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The L'art &amp; La Matire line intrigued me and I wanted try their range before dropping over $300 for a bottle. <br />
I tried many samples and was wearing them leaving enough time to make a decision. Yes, I tried Angelique Noir, and SDV and Cuir Beluga. All the most popular ones. I couldn't get past the first hour of angelica before AN got better, SDV is a little too boozy for me, and there was something in every one of them that made it just a strong like but not a love from start to finish. <br />
I tried Oud Nude in Prague in the L'institute first and it stood out to me. The other two oud fragrances did not speak to me, but Oud Nude starts out beautifully with a blast of sweet almond and raspberry, but it's not too fruity or gourmand due to the agarwood which is very soft. This combo makes the fragrance very elegant, classy and somewhat powdery I find. It's is on the feminine side. <br />
I love it from start to finish even better when the vanilla comes out later. Unfortunately I have to admit that at some point on this journey after wearing it a couple of times I became anosmic to it. People around me can still smell it and they compliment on it. Then next day I would smell it again on my clothes. No regret buying the FB I just wish I could smell it all the time because it is a very well put together fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1738617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1738617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738511" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mister_chaz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.22287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mister_chaz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22287">mister_chaz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft raspberry vanilla with a touch of oud wood. Much softer than I anticipated. Very balanced, nothing screechy or screaming, nothing like Raghba (thank God!), it's not like Bouquet Ideale either (that one is stronger and screechy). Perhaps a little too soft? But maybe that's why there's  :nude: in the name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1738511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1738511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1724527" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1724527" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mizur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mizur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Sensual-40563.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40563.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensual"title="Sensual"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1724527ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1724527" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503389">mizur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-03">01/03/23 20:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deliciously creamy and fruity woods!<br />
<br />
Delphine Jelk created a true masterpiece with this perfume, and nude is a perfect description of what this fragrance is a stripped down soft aroma that would be loved and admired by everyone.<br />
<br />
The Agarwood is soft woody and provocative, the Raspberry is tangy and alluring, the Bourbon Vanilla is creamy and decadent, and the Almond is like a cloud enveloping the whole fragrance, the perfect blend for an enticing experience.<br />
<br />
This parfum is completely unisex, it doesnt lean one way or the other, anyone wearing this parfum will simply feel like a million dollars.<br />
<br />
Although suited for any weather, I would reserve it for a special occasion.<br />
<br />
Projection is moderate, with good sillage, and longevity of over 10+ hours.<br />
<br />
 Loved this fragrance!!<br />
<br />
***UPDATE***<br />
<br />
I wore it for a second time, now layered with Gingembre Ptillant from Atelier Versace, and the result was amazing an even more intoxicating and addictive vanilla surrounded the whole fragrance which elevated an almost perfect perfume into a whole new level!!<br />
<br />
The combination of Oud Nude and Gingembre Ptillant has probably been my most complimented scent to date!!<br />
<br />
***UPDATE 2***<br />
<br />
Its been almost 36 hours since I sprayed Oud Nude and Gingembre Ptillant, and they are both still intimately noticeable granted I havent taken a bath yet, but I have washed my hands and face several times, and I have also changed all my clothes, including my undergarments, and I can still pick up both perfumes at this point they are only faintly present, but still, for the number of hours that have passed this duo has quite an impressive performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1724527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1724527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1724459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1724459" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fluffyandpuffy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/868116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fluffyandpuffy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Psychedelic-Love-45977.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45977.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Psychedelic Love"title="Psychedelic Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1724459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1724459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/868116">Fluffyandpuffy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-03">01/03/23 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow what a beautiful and so interesting scent. I get the berry and almond is strong in the opening. Then mellows down and soft leather comes in gently and sweet. I was wondering if I would like this this with the leather notes and oud, usually too strong and in your face, takin over but not here. Im in love with this. It will be better when it is cooler weather. So expensive though. Well done. Worth a sample for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1724459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1724459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1723138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
