It is unique to anything I have or had in my collection.  The dry down is my favorite part but I will enjoy the process from beginning to end. Not sure if I will ever use this bottle up but will enjoy it during cooler days and evenings.  <br />
<br />
Now honesty about the price.  There was a recent price increase from this brand. Had they still had the previous price of about 260.00 US dollars I would say 100 percent worth it. But now 360.00 US dollars?   I mean I guess , because it is long lasting and smells of quality but beyond that not sure.   Truly do wish these houses would offer 30 or 50 ml options more often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1712677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1712677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1711522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1696743" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Calvini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.518579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Calvini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1696743ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1696743" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/518579">Calvini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-26">11/26/22 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On paper, it's pretty pleasant with all the top-voted sweet powdery notes present, but on the skin they quickly fade to make room for Guerlain's "oud" reminiscent of Songe d'un Bois, which is dry, musty, and slightly savory. Overall feels like a rehash of their previous renderings without much improvement.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1696743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1696743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KatherineC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1533422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KatherineC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/James-Heeley/Blanc-Poudre-52307.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52307.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Poudre"title="Blanc Poudre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533422">KatherineC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lightly sweet smoky perfume. This is an enchanting scent, gentle, alluring and sensual. To my nose, the oud is more incense-y than barnyard, yet there is a tinge of funk. The rose here is faint, overtaken by almond and vanilla. The raspberry lasts through the dry down and adds a fruity sweetness. This is my favorite of the three ouds. A very strong like, but not quite a love. I will savor my decant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1694956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1694956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1692479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1692479" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoseE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoseE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Le-Jour-se-Leve-48305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Jour se Lve"title="Le Jour se Lve"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1692479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1692479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1219086">NoseE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-20">11/20/22 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After few minutes, oud is struggling for identity as almond + vanilla dominate. <br />
Raspberry is pushed away, rose is non existing <br />
<br />
Not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1692479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1692479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1691543" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1691543" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rainydays"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rainydays" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Mmmm-40461.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40461.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mmmm..."title="Mmmm..."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1691543ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1691543" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14600">rainydays</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-18">11/18/22 23:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not have vast experience with oud and therefore wanted to try something I expected would be a pleasant, safe introduction to the note. This is sweet, feminine, effervescent, yet woody and a touch smoky. The fruit (raspberry, yet as other have mentioned comes across like cherry) is punchy and a little synthetic. Unfortunately almond sometimes comes across as medicinal to my nose and I get that here. The woodiness of the oud, I don't mind. It seems to blend well. The market for this one might be tough. If you enjoy oud, this may be too fruity-sweet and not dark enough for you. If you hate oud, it is probably too evident here for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1691543"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1691543#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1685248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1685248" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Abdulla88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1156056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Abdulla88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Falcon-Leather-59057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falcon Leather"title="Falcon Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1685248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1685248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156056">Abdulla88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-10">11/10/22 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its smells exactly like Fugue a Paris Fouquet's !!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1685248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1685248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1679786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1679786" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emera1d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1162562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emera1d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1679786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1679786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162562">Emera1d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-03">11/03/22 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I sprayed I got a blast of cherry and had to check I got the correct sample (for a second I thought it was Cherry Oud). Came here to check and I guess what I recognised as cherry was the raspberry and almond. Much gentler and easier to where than Cherry Oud, which is pure leather to my nose. It is definitely powdery and the oud isn't too strong, which makes it more wearable for me, but as nice as it is I thing the price is too high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1679786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1679786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1672716" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1672716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1672716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-23">10/23/22 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A warm, spicy, smoky oud with fruity and vanillic aspects. Not animalic in the least, but it does have a woody "twist" to remind the wearer. <br />
<br />
Has much in common with Oud Imperial by Armani Priv.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1672716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1672716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1671439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1671439" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BostonScentGuy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1052452"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BostonScentGuy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1671439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1671439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1052452">BostonScentGuy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-21">10/21/22 20:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Loving this a lot even though it doesn't tread new ground or anything. A tonkafied, fluffy, sweet oud is a dime a dozen now. What does make this truly "Guerlain," however are the textural elements of the Guerlinade on full display. Classic Guerlains definitely have this three dimensional plush feeling that makes them melt into the skin, and I really feel that strongly here--some combination of coumarin, ionones, heliotropin, musks, and the like. Whatever magical, alchemical combo is used here, it really does evoke that classic Guerlinade--even moreso than some other recent releases. The image that flashes in my brain is of a vivid patch of purple heliotrope springing forth from a slightly charred wooden log. Lovely and intimate. Definitely not a "must have," but I can see myself frequently spritzing this at a Guerlain counter, worming my way into samples, etc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1671439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1671439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1671313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1671313" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="christinky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="christinky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Tonka-76063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"title="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1671313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1671313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242898">christinky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-21">10/21/22 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really lovely, but not really unique.  I'm happy to wear the sample I recieved with the Guerlain order I made, and if I were given a bottle I'd wear it, but I won't buy it as I have other perfumes like it, so would be redundant in my collection.  Sometimes the raspberry-almond-rose combo comes off like cherry on me, and it's more like a cherry with light oud.  There is a touch of Shagaf Oud in this but this is much more subdued than Shagaf Oud. I don't get why they called it "Nude," though, because I'm not experiencing this as a skin scent or a scent that one could wear with everything (as in a nude-colored shoe which could be worn with so many outfits) which is how I read that name. <br />
I'm a little surprised at these recent releases from Guerlain, because they aren't doing it for me, and I have three forever favorites from L'Art et La Mat: Cuir Beluga, Tonka Imperiale, and Angelique Noir, so I was expecting to be blown away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1671313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1671313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1670788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mez0Nez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mez0Nez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1670788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1670788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1205933">Mez0Nez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-20">10/20/22 23:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dried down is so similar to Gloria by Cacharel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1670788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1670788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1670056" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BeardedIris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327662.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BeardedIris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Patchouli-Noisette-83488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Patchouli Noisette"title="Patchouli Noisette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1670056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1670056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327662">BeardedIris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-20">10/20/22 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OK, we're back at smoky, woody vanilla. The accord of a thousand niche houses over the last decade, Memoirs of a Trespasser, Lune Feline, A une Madone. And here is Guerlain late to the party. But oh Guerlain, you are so good at this stuff. No timidity here. The Guerlain vanilla we know and love but the smoky, ashy oud is just the right strength to punch this into new territory. There's a softening rosy sandalwood here too (the faint ghost of Samsara), rounding out the woody notes. I mean I'm really beyond saturation point with vanilla perfumes but this beautiful, smoky blend has caught my interest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1670056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1670056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1668931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1668931" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angelzq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1279379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angelzq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1668931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1668931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279379">Angelzq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-18">10/18/22 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gentle, smooth, light oud with a hint of sourness in the background, like a sour berry, which gives it some uniqueness. It's okay, a little synthetic. The drydown is the nicest part. And after a long day, all that is left is the typical Guerlain's vanilla dna. <br />
My favourite from the 3 new ouds.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1668931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1668931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666123" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chergui53"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/674144"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.674144.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chergui53" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/674144">chergui53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-14">10/14/22 13:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a sample of Oud Nude.  Usually I'm on the fence about oud...depends on what's surrounding it and backing it up.  I applied just a dab to one wrist.  OMGoodness, on my skin this is NOT nude, quiet, gentle, pleasant, or soft. It started out with blast of cedar.  Very pungent that it made the back of my throat burn.  After 30 minutes the cedar was still super strong.  This wasn't a wrist sniffer for my nose.  I could hold my arm as far away from my nose as possible and still be gassed by the cedar.  At 60 minutes, I didn't smell any other notes (they must have all been drowned out by the cedar), and I felt the start of a headache.  I don't know if this is a synthetic, chemical scent or just a super strong natural fragrance.  Maybe I'm sensitive to cedar?  I scrubbed it off at 60 minutes.  Now there's a faint sweet fruit and vanilla scent.  This one isn't for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1666123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1666123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666102" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aspirina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.128870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aspirina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Eaudemoiselle-de-Givenchy-Ambre-Velours-18920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"title="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666102ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666102" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870">aspirina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-14">10/14/22 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample with a Guerlain purchase. It is soft, powdery, almondy, somewhat pretty. But the oud is there, in the center of the stage...almost like rancid BO. The scent would be totally fantastic without the Oud, and that is sad, because apparently the purpose of this scent is to sell Oud for the people that dislike that note...<br />
So Guerlain made a dreamy powdery scent, delicate, beautiful and deliberately decided to ruin it with a big dose of obnoxious oud...not a good idea really...<br />
Now make an almond powdery scent  with tons of vanilla and some rose and raspberry....sans Oud!<br />
I would buy a full bottle! and I mean something "nude" and delicate like this, not like LPRN (which I like but it is pink not nude...)<br />
I agree with the Raghba comparisons.<br />
The drydown is nice still tainted with the annoying oud, but I can't stop thinking how perfect this scent would be without the oud...<br />
It is like the most perfect and delicate lace negligee that somehow has been stained with a big drop of mud and it can't be cleaned, it has been forever ruined...<br />
<br />
Sad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1666102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1666102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1665757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665757" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vanian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.132632.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vanian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132632">Vanian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-14">10/14/22 03:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have only tried it from the samples I was given when I bought another product from Guerlain's online shop. Decided to leave a review now and when I get a FB will come back to add more details if needed. <br />
On my skin the fragrance opens with raspberry accord which literally disappears after a few seconds to leave space to an amazing bitter almond,  followed by the spices (cardamom,  saffron and cinnamon), then the raspberry appears again, at the very back stage somewhere there waits the vanilla. Everything is wrapped in a very soft barely there, but still noticeable oud accord. Surprisingly the rose comes last. Then after awhile everything blends together to give me a luxorious feel of a soft and mellow perfume-y elegance. Hey, this fragrance will make me take oud scent on a different level.<br />
Edit (23thOct22): As I've never before liked Oud note in fragrances,  well until I tried this one - Oud Nude, am now in a search to find out the meaning of the word oud, google it and bumped into a lovely description of whether oud smells attractive - 'The aroma of 'natural' oudh is distinctively irresistible and attractive with bitter sweet and woody nuances: seriously earthy and, in small quantities, supremely sexy'. I think this is what exactly has been achieved in Oud Nude, or at least this is how I feel about it. Well,  it's a love for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1665757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1665757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1665215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665215" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cicely81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cicely81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lubin/Kismet-42231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kismet"title="Kismet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224196">Cicely81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression: chemical anosmia. I smell a faint and soft almond and then it vanishes into nothing. I wish I could smell all those lovely sounding notes which would be up my alley.<br />
<br />
Edit: Yes, unfortunately, there is a familiar aromachemical here that gives me anosmia. This is usually the IsoE super look-alikes, that veer between cedary horror and anosmia for me. <br />
<br />
Are you adding loads of this now to your perfumes, Guerlain? And is this REALLY selling for 280?<br />
<br />
 LArt et la Matiere was about quality materials mixed with skill. There is nothing quality about this aromachemical concoction and I dont know about the skills involved in adding a bucketload of IsoE super to a perfume to make it more marketable. This is lazy perfumery sold as luxury.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1665215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1665215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1663897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1663897" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dcjimr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1186069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dcjimr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1663897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1663897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069">dcjimr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-11">10/11/22 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud light, but still gives off a slight B.O. vibe to me.  Very pleasant if you don't mind that or your nose doesn't identify it that way.  Not really worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1663897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1663897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1663144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1663144" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="parispeach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/500472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="parispeach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Manhattan-Eau-de-Parfum-77295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Manhattan Eau de Parfum"title="Manhattan Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1663144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1663144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/500472">parispeach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-10">10/10/22 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does it smell good? Yes! is it worth the price? No!.<br />
<br />
As others have said its very similar to other fragrances that smell just as good and cost a lot less. <br />
<br />
Kalemat, Babylon, Ideale Bouquet to name a few. Its nice yes but its not original or even better than the fragrances mentioned to warrant buying or owning a full bottle. <br />
<br />
If Im honest its abit concerning the direction Guerlain is heading.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1663144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1663144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1662491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1662491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TillyWave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1068805.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TillyWave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Eau-de-Cologne-16028.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16028.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Eau de Cologne"title="Shalimar Eau de Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1662491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1662491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1068805">TillyWave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-09">10/09/22 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the Dessert Rose of my Dreams.  Full disclosure &amp; where I'm coming from:  I am not the biggest gourmand person, I do not love "sweets" and my normal aesthetic is vintage/masculine/dark.  I also love Guerlain. <br />
<br />
Anyway--This opens with luscious roses surrounded by white chocolate, raspberries, and almonds.  With a strong undercurrent of incense and oud, billowing around the sweeter rich gourmand notes.  This lasts a bit while the incense oud wears down, and the sweet dessert notes meld together into a vanilla rose accord, with a nice woody backbone.  <br />
<br />
That's pretty much what this is.  The dessert notes are highly enjoyable and the oud/woods keep the perfume grounded on earth and add a bit of dimension to the whole composition.  Lasts forever on skin with great performance, only a few sprays are necessary for a full day's wear.  I know this is pricey but this is SO well done and simply smells divine, I might have to save up for it.  I very highly recommend this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1662491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1662491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660721" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cascadia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cascadia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-51.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain"title="L'Instant de Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445563">Cascadia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 21:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, this scent is fantastic! Lightest touch of oud to begin, and then just the most yummy, soft creamy deliciousness. Like if someone made a perfume of whipped cream. A tiny bit barely sweet, vanilla, and the warm reassurance of sandalwood. Im seriously considering a full bottle. Sooooooo goood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1660721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1660721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660388" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SofsMama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541074"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541074.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SofsMama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Millesime-Tonka-76063.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76063.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"title="Shalimar Millsime Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541074">SofsMama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening of this reminded me of Sahara noir &amp; I got really excited thinking hold on, have I finally found a dupe of my most beloved discontinued?!. As it dried down it grew sweet, generic &amp; to became more like shaghaf oud like @Kylix said.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1660388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1660388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660022" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kylix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1343206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kylix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/La-Peau-Nue-57922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Peau Nue"title="La Peau Nue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1343206">Kylix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dupe (less special, but very very similar): Shaghaf Oud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1660022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1660022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658132" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mynameismaryam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321425"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321425.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mynameismaryam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6458.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bal d'Afrique"title="Bal d'Afrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321425">mynameismaryam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-03">10/03/22 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one. I get a lot of vanilla and almond with a base of strong sandalwood and some very clean oud. Oud is there, but not in a skanky way at all. I get great performance. This is my favorite of the three, which is interesting because I tried them because of Cherry Oud and ended up liking it the least. Oud Kohl is also a nice scent (a little too soapy for me). I like Oud and like this as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1658132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1658132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1657677" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cyn922"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cyn922" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-14214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose"title="Eau Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1657677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1657677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347730">cyn922</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-02">10/02/22 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luckily, I was able to test this out in store and received a sample for a full wear. I was so ready to blind buy 100ml before Fragrantica has this page up when it was launched few weeks ago. It is an oud perfume with prominent vanilla and almond notes throughout. Fruity and floral notes from the raspberry and rose only last for first ~30 minutes. Since I am not a big fan of this particular oud note and almond in general, I do not enjoy wearing this. I much prefer MFK Oud Silk Mood for a clean cut rose &amp; oud scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1657677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1657677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1656411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1656411" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iris&#039;smom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1367188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iris&#039;smom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1656411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1656411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1367188">Iris&#039;smom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-30">09/30/22 18:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one. Its like a gourmand with a gentle wood undertone. Perfect for people who want a safe wood scent that doesnt take over the entire room. By way of full disclosure, I love everything Guerlain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1656411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1656411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greydove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46434"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.46434.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="greydove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carine-Roitfeld/Carine-72837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carine"title="Carine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46434">greydove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-27">09/27/22 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this one, but I do detect plastic doll head. Luckily, I like that effect. I was worried about the raspberry because it can really dominate in a fragrance, however, this just adds a slightly feminine fruity hint and then the oud kicks in very softly with lots of almond powder on top. Its so pretty and perfect for fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1654067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1654067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1653156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1653156" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iamtlynnette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.989280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iamtlynnette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Rouge-Smoking-51468.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51468.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rouge Smoking"title="Rouge Smoking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1653156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1653156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/989280">iamtlynnette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-26">09/26/22 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oud Nude is by far my favourite of the 3 new oud fragrances Guerlain is offering. No pencil shavings or plastic dolls head here! ;) Plus it lasts forever on mewhich IMO is table stakes when a fragrance costs this much.<br />
<br />
On my skin, this oud is soft, warm, and inviting; woody yet sweet, and I definitely pick up on the almond note, so theres a hint of powder here, too. Temps are still fairly warm where I live so Ill be curious to see how she performs once the weather cools off more</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1653156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1653156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1652183" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ash.nguyen6"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379377"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379377.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ash.nguyen6" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thomas-de-Monaco/Sol-Salgado-Extrait-de-Parfum-87351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sol Salgado Extrait de Parfum"title="Sol Salgado Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1652183ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1652183" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379377">ash.nguyen6</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opens up with a very realistic almond note, like when youre eating an almond nut. <br />
After 5-10 min, the oud comes out. Its a softer, more wearable oud. Im a heavy oud lover, so Oud Nude is too soft for me.<br />
The scent lasted on my skin for about 3 hours and stayed rather close to my body. Keep in mind I sprayed 10+ times.<br />
