Nice scent, but I prefer Cherry Oud, where the oud is louder and is a stronger fragrance overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1652183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1652183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651498" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Violinplayah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058697"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1058697.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Violinplayah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Comete-90434.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90434.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comte"title="Comte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1058697">Violinplayah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-23">09/23/22 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just ok, and a bit lazy if Im being totally honest  smells like the same skeletal base of bois darmenie and tonka imperial with the armpitty oud from santal pao rosa to muddy the sweetness up. Not fbw imo, but I dont like most oud frags so, grain of salt opinion. I will say that this trio of ouds has the same sour tarry leather smell as a lot of Diors (santal noir, spice blend, oud ispahan, etc) , so if you dont like that, you may not like any of these.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1651498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1651498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1649843" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Controlledbyscent31"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Controlledbyscent31" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Asdaaf/Ameerat-Al-Arab-Prive-Rose-81967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "title="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1649843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1649843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758">Controlledbyscent31</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The nicest of the new 3 a lovely vanilla oud. Wasn't nice enough for me to buy it though. But I am very reluctant to add 280 bottle to my already big collection unless it blows me away. <br />
It was just nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1649821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="andrewatic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1051086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="andrewatic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Jicky-Extrait-33601.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33601.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jicky Extrait"title="Jicky Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1649821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1649821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051086">andrewatic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not a fan of Oud, never have been. However this is an absolutely lovely proposition for all those non-fans of Oud fragrances such as myself, because it doesnt reek of Oud in an overdosed and unpleasant way. Quite the opposite: its unexpectedly soft, warm, floral, sweetly balsamic and very addictive. <br />
There is just enough Oud in there to make it intriguing and vibrant, without making it too overpowering. This is simply perfect!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1649675" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joov84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joov84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1649675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1649675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82341">joov84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Guerlain Ouds First impressions<br />
<br />
- Cherry oud : opens up with  cherry and some nice cardamom . Rose soon appears and cherry remains in the background. A nice leather in the base with some cypriol/ oud. I like the drydown. It has a slightly lipsticky/make up leather feel. very good performance. I need more time with this. i'm not a big fan of the cherry/rose combination.<br />
<br />
- Oud khol: Incensy leathery soap. opens with a burst of soap from the aldehydes. smoky almost charred form the incensy, sharp cypriol/ oud and leather. It remains soapy for long . I don't get the praline . very good performance. I'm not a fan of it.<br />
<br />
- Oud Nude: it's from the 24 gold / kalemat/ Raghba family of fragrances but its smoother and with better quality. Really nice raspberry, almond, vanilla and wood . Gourmandish, Delicious sweet fragrance . A hint of smoke. It's my favourite out of the three . excellent performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>

It has a slightly lipsticky/make up leather feel. very good performance. I need more time with this. i'm not a big fan of the cherry/rose combination.<br />
<br />

<br />

Gourmandish, Delicious sweet fragrance . A hint of smoke. It's my favourite out of the three . excellent performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1051086">andrewatic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not a fan of Oud, never have been. However this is an absolutely lovely proposition for all those non-fans of Oud fragrances such as myself, because it doesnt reek of Oud in an overdosed and unpleasant way. Quite the opposite: its unexpectedly soft, warm, floral, sweetly balsamic and very addictive. <br />
There is just enough Oud in there to make it intriguing and vibrant, without making it too overpowering. This is simply perfect!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1649843" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Controlledbyscent31"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Controlledbyscent31" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Asdaaf/Ameerat-Al-Arab-Prive-Rose-81967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "title="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1649843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1649843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758">Controlledbyscent31</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The nicest of the new 3 a lovely vanilla oud. Wasn't nice enough for me to buy it though. But I am very reluctant to add 280 bottle to my already big collection unless it blows me away. <br />
It was just nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1649843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1649843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Itcannotalwaysbenight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Itcannotalwaysbenight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Zouzou-92290.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92290.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zouzou"title="Zouzou"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320">Itcannotalwaysbenight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Minimalist and sexy are two things that come to mind when describing Oud Nude. Oud Nude is the perfect namesake for this "barely-there-oud" masterpiece.  The oud in this one is sheer and soft... it is not dark, heavy, nor too earthy as with many mainstream ouds. I would further describe the oud as an abstract tickle of leather. You pick up on the slightest leathery oud note, but it is not heavy nor in your face. Many (even with a refined nose) would not be able to place this as an "oud" fragrance. It is a barely-there oud, so devout oud lovers may be left disappointed. <br />
<br />
The raspberry is my favorite note of all in Oud Nude. Delphine Jelk's play on raspberry is what makes this fragrance a masterpiece in my eyes. Imagine biting into the ripest, plump raspberry on a cool summer evening. The raspberry note is the perfect balance of tart and sweet. I find that most fragrances do not capture the tartness elements in berry fruits accurately, many berry accords come off as either synthetic or overly sweet. Oud Nude is a true photorealistic play on raspberry. The vanilla and almond are also present, but they do not present as gourmand. The almond is more woody than nutty, and the vanilla more so creamy than sweet. The cedar and sandalwood are where I would draw comparisons to Xerjoff Bouquet Ideale, but other than that they are two different legends on their own. <br />
<br />
I am smitten and could go on for days about Oud Nude (feel free to PM me to discuss more). I am so proud to call this my signature year round fragrance. Others will want to inhale your scent cloud whenever you have on Oud Nude. I hate the idea of buying "back-up" bottles, but for fear of Guerlain's history and pattern of discontinuations, a second 200ml bottle is on my wish list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="2151936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=2151936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gatorsrules"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565764.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gatorsrules" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565764">Gatorsrules</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-24">06/24/23 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great intro to Oud IMO. Its quite western style Oud with a touch of fruit and powdery accords. The raspberry behaves more like cherry with a bit of a syrupy/tart vibe. The almond and woods balance the Oud. This isnt an animalic Oud for me. May be FB worthy, and it also behaves with the heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1863885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1863885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="76304" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1665215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665215" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cicely81"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cicely81" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lubin/Kismet-42231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kismet"title="Kismet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224196">Cicely81</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression: chemical anosmia. I smell a faint and soft almond and then it vanishes into nothing. I wish I could smell all those lovely sounding notes which would be up my alley.<br />
<br />
Edit: Yes, unfortunately, there is a familiar aromachemical here that gives me anosmia. This is usually the IsoE super look-alikes, that veer between cedary horror and anosmia for me. <br />
<br />
Are you adding loads of this now to your perfumes, Guerlain? And is this REALLY selling for 280?<br />
<br />
 LArt et la Matiere was about quality materials mixed with skill. There is nothing quality about this aromachemical concoction and I dont know about the skills involved in adding a bucketload of IsoE super to a perfume to make it more marketable. This is lazy perfumery sold as luxury.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1665215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1665215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1738889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1738889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thesheppardess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.770623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thesheppardess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1738889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1738889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623">thesheppardess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I detect is oud. Then there is my other nemesis, sandalwood. Because of the oud, I dont catch the other listed notes. Maybe a slight bit of sour fruit and rose, but I really have to stretch my imagination to detect either note.<br />
Please note that I love many other Guerlain fragrances; it is my favourite house. I was hoping perhaps the had created an oud-based fragrance that I might like, but no.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="76304"comment_id="1738889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Guerlain/Oud-Nude-76304.html?ccid=1738889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802474" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mwoodle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1111300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mwoodle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Parfum-2024-89584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Parfum (2024)"title="Miss Dior Parfum (2024)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802474ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802474" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);               tabindex="1" title=" @Siv7Stars just did some research. 180 for 50ml seems standard.">by
            <em>Gurreu</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69248.png"

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">58.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Zoologist-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Zoologist Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
